summary: TAKATA RECALL  IT HAS BEEN OVER A YEAR SINCE BEING NOTIFIED ABOUT THE TAKATA AIRBAG RECALL FOR OUR 2012 VOLKSWAGEN PASSAT.  THE LETTER FROM VOLKSWAGEN NOTIFYING US OF AN IMPORTANT SAFETY RECALL WAS DATED APRIL 2016. THIS SAFETY RECALL HAS AFFECTED OUR USE OF THE VEHICLE SINCE WE DO NOT WANT TO DRIVE A VEHICLE THAT HAS AN OUTSTANDING SAFETY RECALL.  IT HAS ALSO AFFECTED RESALE OF THE VEHICLE SINCE WE DO NOT WANT TO SELL A VEHICLE THAT HAS A SAFETY ISSUE.   DO WE HAVE TO WAIT FOR AN ACCIDENT, INJURY, OR EVEN DEATH BEFORE SOMETHING IS DONE?
